__data__.text:
Introduction

This API reference contains an alphabetical overview of all API requests relevant to the Notecard and Notehub. The sections below detail the options available for each request, what each request returns, and example requests.

Note

Notecard Requests vs. Notehub Requests

This guide covers requests that can be used from host firmware against the Notecard, as well as requests that can be made against Notehub using cURL commands or a web-based application. Several requests can be performed in both locations, while some are specific to the Notecard or Notehub. Limitations on where an API request can be issued are noted in the reference below with badges.

 for requests that can be made directly against the Notecard API.

 for requests that can be made through the Notehub API.
card Requests
